tootip.luxium.energy.storage: Maybe he keeps it in himself:
tootip.luxium.chronicles.tom1: Tome I ▶ Bright ray pointing to the sky
tootip.luxium.chronicles.tom2: Tome II ▶ The hidden darkness of the soul burning in agony

message.luxium.entity.demon.first_meetin: Oh! Well, not that. Another little man decided to summon me for the sake of... armbands...
